description.value: You've poured all your creativity into making your weapon truly eye-catching. Choose one weapon you own to decorate in your own style. While wielding your chosen weapon, add the weapon's tracking value as an item bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Feint] and Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Demoralize]. You can only have one such weapon active at a time. You can spend 24 hours customizing a new weapon, at which point your connection with your previous weapon is lost.
